scripts.repo:push: cd public/ && git add . && git commit -m "update" && git push origin gh-pages && cd ..
scripts.repo:init: [ -d public/.git ] || (npm run clean && git clone -b gh-pages git@github.com:sobstel/golazon.git public/)
scripts.publish: npm run repo:init && npm run build && ./bin/cachebuster && cp public/index.html public/404.html && touch public/.nojekyll && npm run repo:push
